outfit_data.top: A crisp white oversized linen shirt, featuring exaggerated sleeves gathered at the wrists and a sharp, angular collar that stands tall. The shirt is left partially unbuttoned to reveal a sliver of black lace camisole underneath, adding a touch of sensuality and texture.
outfit_data.bottom: Tailored black denim wide-leg pants with a high-rise waist and a slightly cropped length. The straight, boxy silhouette adds to the avant-garde feel, while the denim provides a casual yet sophisticated base.
outfit_data.shoes: Sleek black leather platform sandals with chunky heels. The sharp lines of the platforms echo the angularity of the top and pants, creating a cohesive and impactful look.
outfit_data.extras: A bold red silk scarf is tied around the neck, adding a splash of color and personality to the monochrome palette.
